event.title: 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Buin spans

data.event: According to the 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Buin spans an area of 214.1 km2 (83 sq mi) and has 63,419 inhabitants (31,440 men and 31,979 women).
The population grew by 20.1% (10,627 persons) between the 1992 and 2002 censuses.

event.title: is directly elected every four years

data.event: As a commune, Buin is a third-level administrative division of Chile administered by a municipal council, headed by an alcalde who is directly elected every four years.
